dataList.title: Los Mariachis
dataList.content: And here comes the final round. You all keeping a good eye on your chips?
Hm, I’m all in.

dataList.title: Los Mariachis
dataList.content: … All in?

dataList.title: Yurodivy
dataList.content: Ooh~ Dealt a nice hand, huh, Rodya?

dataList.title: Tieqiu Crew
dataList.content: Hah~ That swagger of yours’s been rubbin’ me the wrong way the whole way. You lose this round and you're out, y'know that? The hell are ya countin' on?
I’m the kind of gal who goes for the climactic flourish of the final round wager.

dataList.title: Tieqiu Crew
dataList.content: Not so fast. Pull your sleeve up. Don’t think I missed your little sleight-of-hand there.
The heck's your problem?

dataList.title: Tieqiu Crew
dataList.content: You just put one of them wish stickers you got from the Tingtang bossman on your arm.

dataList.title: Tieqiu Crew
dataList.content: That's why you went all-in on the chips this round—so you can nab the Golden Bough for yourself. Can't fool me.

dataList.title: Tieqiu Crew
dataList.content: Lookee here, all! Right ‘ere ‘neath her hand, this thing. ‘S got to be the sticker, ey?
… Can ya back it up?

dataList.title: Yurodivy
dataList.content: Sorry, Rodya, but can I take a look at your wrist for a second?

dataList.title: Tieqiu Crew
dataList.content: Oh no, you ain't! Don’t you touch ‘er. Far as I know, you two might be in cahoots.

dataList.title: Tieqiu Crew
dataList.content: Nooow, I’ll lay ‘er arm bare, so keep your eyes peeled, aight? I knew this sly little fox would play dirty.

dataList.title: Los Mariachis
dataList.content: Wait, something about this whole situation... this exchange... it all feels oddly familiar. Am I having a déjà-vu?
You sure are small-minded for such a big hunk of metal, huh? Why are you being such a nitpicky asshole about this?

dataList.title: Tieqiu Crew
dataList.content: Didn’t they teach you that with stolen Wishpower comes strict responsibility?
… You’ve been watching too many movies. What stolen Wishpower?
And what if you're wrong, huh? Gonna fold and forfeit the game?

dataList.title: Tieqiu Crew
dataList.content: Hah, you’ve got guts. Fine, I’ll bet all my stakes that there’s a piece o’ the Wishpower on your wrist. What do you say?
Same as yours, which means it's gonna be either you or me. So ask yourself this: am I feeling lucky? Well, do ya, dickhead?

dataList.title: Tieqiu Crew
dataList.content: Pahahahah! Oh that’s cute. And I'm the one who watches too many movies? Anyhoo, our wager's final, ey?

dataList.title: Los Mariachis
dataList.content: Oh my… It's just like in that— I think I know where this is going…

dataList.title: Tieqiu Crew
dataList.content: Here goes, the moment of truth~

dataList.title: Tieqiu Crew
dataList.content: Wuhuh? What’s going on ‘ere?

dataList.title: Tieqiu Crew
dataList.content: I saw it. I saw the little fox rub ‘er wrist! There’s—there’s no way…

dataList.title: Yurodivy
dataList.content: That means you’re out. What a pity.
What happens to the loser, then? Lop off a hand or something?

dataList.title: Yurodivy
dataList.content: You’re joking, right, Rodya? What's the point of removing a prosthetic hand?

dataList.title: Tieqiu Crew
dataList.content: No, this is… This can’t be right…

dataList.title: Yurodivy
dataList.content: The defeated will be shown generosity, but false accusations need to be taken care of with more finality.

dataList.title: Los Mariachis
dataList.content: Hang on, are you…?
[DEVELOPER COMMENT NOT TO DISPLAY]
Gweh… What in the…!

dataList.title: Los Mariachis
dataList.content: Holy crap, that came in like a car crash! Couldn't you have put a blinker on for a warning or something?!

dataList.title: Los Mariachis
dataList.content: Ugh… Look at all the grease and spinal fluid… *gag*

dataList.title: Yurodivy
dataList.content: Remember, Rodya? It’s that same trash compactor from our Backstreets' junkyard.

dataList.title: Yurodivy
dataList.content: Remember what I said back then?

dataList.title: Yurodivy
dataList.content: That we proletariats must unite and take down the ruling class and build a new society.

dataList.title: Yurodivy
dataList.content: I even remember your reply:

dataList.title: Yurodivy
dataList.content: “If you mean we should round up the rich and flatten ‘em under one of those compactors, then I’m all for it.”
… Small correction: I said “crush 'em 'til they pop.”

dataList.title: Yurodivy
dataList.content: … Is that so.

dataList.title: Yurodivy
dataList.content: Rodya, are you still unwilling to return to the Yurodiviye?
I…
We all heard that loud slam just now, right?

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: I sure did. After a quarrel about… Wishpower and the like.
What? Did they catch on? Oi, quit spacin' out and try turnin' that clock.
Gosh, Can you stop pushing— Ahhh!
Huh, woah—?!
Unfortunately, the door we were leaning against was a flimsy wooden frame covered with rice paper...
... and we all tumbled into the room as the door fell.
